languages.text: "Я рад найти опору в твоих словах. Я скреплю свою душу и отрину страх. Благодарю, что не дал{mf||а} мне оступиться и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".

traits.locale_text: "Что же, я рад найти опору в твоих словах. Я скреплю свою душу и отрину страх. Благодарю, что не дал{mf||а} мне оступиться и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".

languages.text: "I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."
languages.original_text: "Я рад найти опору в твоих словах. Я скреплю свою душу и отрину страх. Благодарю, что не дал{mf||а} мне оступиться и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".

traits.locale_text: "I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, my {mf|son|daughter}."
"I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, my {mf|son|daughter}."
"I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, my {mf|son|daughter}."
"I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, my {mf|son|daughter}."
"I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."
"I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."

languages.text: “我很高兴能听你这么说。我愿意坚定我的灵魂，驱散我的恐惧，高尚的{name}。感谢你没有让我误入歧途，消除了我的疑虑。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴能听你这么说。我愿意坚定我的灵魂，驱散我的恐惧，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。感谢你没有让我误入歧途，消除了我的疑虑。”

languages.text: 「お前の言葉を聞いて安心した。魂を要塞化し、恐れを捨てよう。{name}よ、私をつまづかせず、迷いをなくしてくれたこと、感謝する」
languages.original_text: "I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言葉を聞いて安心した。魂を要塞化し、恐れを捨てよう。{mf|息子|娘}よ、私をつまづかせず、迷いをなくしてくれたこと、感謝する」

languages.text: «Me alegra contar con sus palabras. Fortaleceré mi alma y desterraré mi miedo. Gracias por no dejarme caer y despejar mis dudas, noble {name}».
languages.original_text: "I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra contar con sus palabras. Fortaleceré mi alma y desterraré mi miedo. Gracias por no dejarme caer y despejar mis dudas, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: "Ich bin froh, dass ich mich auf Eure Worte stützen kann. Ich werde meine Seele stärken und meine Angst über Bord werfen. Danke, {mf|nobler|noble} {name}. Ihr habt nicht zugelassen, dass ich stolpere, und Ihr habt meine Zweifel vertrieben."
languages.original_text: "I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin froh, dass ich mich auf Eure Worte stützen kann. Ich werde meine Seele stärken und meine Angst über Bord werfen. Danke, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Ihr habt nicht zugelassen, dass ich stolpere, und Ihr habt meine Zweifel vertrieben."

languages.text: « Vos paroles me sont d'un grand réconfort. Je vais donc pouvoir fortifier mon âme et rejeter la peur qui m'assaille. Merci de ne pas me laisser trébucher et de m'aider à me débarrasser de mes doutes, noble {name}. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles me sont d'un grand réconfort. Je vais donc pouvoir fortifier mon âme et rejeter la peur qui m'assaille. Merci de ne pas me laisser trébucher, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}, et de m'aider à me débarrasser de mes doutes. »

languages.text: "Sözlerine güvenebiliyor olduğum için müteşekkirim. Ruhumu güçlendireceğim ve korkumu bir kenara bırakacağım. Hata yapmama mani olduğun ve şüphelerimi giderdiğin için teşekkürler asil {name}."
languages.original_text: "I am glad that I can lean on your words. I will fortify my soul and cast away my fear. Thank you for not letting me stumble and banishing my doubts, noble {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerine güvenebiliyor olduğum için müteşekkirim. Ruhumu güçlendireceğim ve korkumu bir kenara bırakacağım. Hata yapmama mani olduğun ve şüphelerimi giderdiğin için teşekkürler asil {name}."
